statements: SELECT * FROM Art;
SELECT id, title, artist FROM Art;
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE year > 2000;
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE artist = 'Picasso';
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE title LIKE '%abstract%';
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE year BETWEEN 1900 AND 1950;
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) FROM Art GROUP BY artist;
SELECT AVG(year) FROM Art;
SELECT artist, MAX(year) FROM Art GROUP BY artist;
SELECT * FROM Art ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM Art ORDER BY artist, year;
SELECT * FROM Art ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, artist, year FROM Art WHERE id = 1;
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) FROM Art WHERE year > 2000 GROUP BY artist;
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE artist = 'Van Gogh' OR artist = 'Monet';
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE artist IN ('Van Gogh', 'Monet');
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE year IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE title = 'Starry Night' AND artist = 'Van Gogh';
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE title = 'Sunflowers' OR title = 'Water Lilies';
SELECT * FROM Art WHERE artist LIKE '%anet';
SELECT * FROM Art_Gallery
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM Art_Gallery
SELECT * FROM Artwork
SELECT title, artist, price FROM Artwork
SELECT a.title, a.price, g.gallery_name FROM Artwork a JOIN Art_Gallery g ON a.gallery_id = g.gallery_id
SELECT a.title, a.price, g.gallery_name FROM Artwork a JOIN Art_Gallery g USING (gallery_id)
SELECT a.title, a.price, g.location FROM Artwork a JOIN Art_Gallery g ON a.gallery_id = g.gallery_id
SELECT a.title, a.price, g.location FROM Artwork a JOIN Art_Gallery g USING (gallery_id)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Art_Gallery
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Artwork
SELECT AVG(price) FROM Artwork
SELECT MIN(price) FROM Artwork
SELECT MAX(price) FROM Artwork
SELECT * FROM Art_Gallery WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM Art_Gallery WHERE location LIKE '%York'
SELECT * FROM Art_Gallery ORDER BY gallery_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Art_Gallery ORDER BY gallery_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Art_Gallery LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Art_Gallery LIMIT 5 OFFSET 5
SELECT * FROM Artwork WHERE price > 1000
SELECT * FROM artists
SELECT artist_name FROM artists
SELECT art_style FROM artists
SELECT * FROM paintings
SELECT painting_title FROM paintings
SELECT painting_title, artist_id FROM paintings
SELECT * FROM galleries
SELECT gallery_name FROM galleries
SELECT location FROM galleries
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM galleries
SELECT artist_name, art_style FROM artists JOIN paintings ON artists.artist_id = paintings.artist_id JOIN galleries ON galleries.gallery_id = artists.artist_id
SELECT * FROM paintings WHERE painting_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc'
SELECT gallery_name FROM galleries WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM paintings ORDER BY painting_title ASC
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE artist_name LIKE '%Van Gogh%'
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE art_style = 'Impressionism'
SELECT * FROM paintings JOIN artists ON paintings.artist_id = artists.artist_id JOIN galleries ON galleries.gallery_id = artists.artist_id
SELECT * FROM paintings JOIN artists ON paintings.artist_id = artists.artist_id JOIN galleries ON galleries.gallery_id = artists.artist_id WHERE paintings.painting_title LIKE '%Starry Night%'
SELECT gallery_name FROM galleries WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM artists WHERE artists.artist_id = galleries.gallery_id)
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT id, name FROM artworks;
SELECT id, title, artist_id, year_created FROM artworks;
SELECT * FROM museums;
SELECT id, name, location FROM museums;
SELECT * FROM exhibitions;
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date, museum_id FROM exhibitions;
SELECT * FROM art_collections;
SELECT id, artwork_id, collection_name FROM art_collections;
SELECT a.name AS artist_name, a.style AS artist_style, aw.title AS artwork_title, aw.year_created AS artwork_year_created FROM artists AS a JOIN artworks AS aw ON a.id = aw.artist_id;

SELECT a.name AS artist_name, aw.title AS artwork_title, m.name AS museum_name, m.location AS museum_location FROM artists AS a JOIN artworks AS aw ON a.id = aw.artist_id JOIN museums AS m ON aw.artist_id = m.id;

SELECT aw.title AS artwork_title, m.name AS museum_name, m.location AS museum_location, e.name AS exhibition_name, e.start_date, e.end_date FROM artworks AS aw JOIN museums AS m ON aw.artist_id = m.id JOIN exhibitions AS e ON m.id = e.museum_id;

SELECT a.name AS artist_name, a.style AS artist_style, aw.title AS artwork_title, aw.year_created AS artwork_year_created, ac.collection_name FROM artists AS a JOIN artworks AS aw ON a.id = aw.artist_id JOIN art_collections AS ac ON aw.id = ac.artwork_id;
SELECT m.name AS museum_name, e.name AS exhibition_name, e.start_date, e.end_date FROM museums AS m JOIN exhibitions AS e ON m.id = e.museum_id;
SELECT a.name AS artist_name, aw.title AS artwork_title FROM artists AS a JOIN artworks AS aw ON a.id = aw.artist_id WHERE aw.year_created > 2000;
SELECT m.name AS museum_name, e.name AS exhibition_name FROM museums AS m JOIN exhibitions AS e ON m.id = e.museum_id WHERE e.start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT a.name AS artist_name, a.style AS artist_style, aw.title AS artwork_title, aw.year_created AS artwork_year_created FROM artists AS a JOIN artworks AS aw ON a.id = aw.artist_id WHERE a.style = 'Impressionism';
SELECT m.name AS museum_name, e.name AS exhibition_name, e.start_date, e.end_date FROM museums AS m JOIN exhibitions AS e ON m.id = e.museum_id WHERE m.location = 'New York';

SELECT a.name AS artist_name, a.style AS artist_style, aw.title AS artwork_title, aw.year_created AS artwork_year_created, ac.collection_name FROM artists AS a JOIN artworks AS aw ON a.id = aw.artist_id JOIN art_collections AS ac ON aw.id = ac.artwork_id WHERE ac.collection_name = 'Private Collection';
